title: All tvOS Games Must Support the Apple TV Remote
text: If you thought that your life will be easier as an iOS developer that wants to start creating games for the new Apple TV, think again because you will have to make sure that any game you develop with support for a third party game controller must also come with full compatibility with Apple's Apple TV Remote.
